title: Dominion Chat Idea
body:
Hi all,

Would anyone be interested in a Dominion public chat on the client so that we, as a community, can host custom games of Dominion 24/7 until it disappears? This will also give the newer players, who never got to experience it, a chance to play.

This seemed to work for the Pool Party event when people wanted to queue up for rewards so I thought why not try it out here.

replies.body: One already exists, and has done since I started playing in S4. The chatroom is called "Dominion"
Ah okay. I wasn't aware but thanks.
